channel.title: Space Shuttle on 无关紧要的宇宙
channel.description: Recent content in Space Shuttle on 无关紧要的宇宙

item.title: Texas politicians warn Smithsonian it must not lobby to retain its space shuttle
item.description: Generating “…public resistance to the provision’s enforcement.”

item.title: Houston, you’ve got a space shuttle… only NASA won’t say which one
item.description: “The acting administrator has made an identification.”

item.title: Rocket Report: SpaceX to make its own propellant; China’s largest launch pad
item.description: United Launch Alliance begins stacking its third Vulcan rocket for the second time.

item.title: “It’s a heist”: Senator calls out Texas for trying to steal shuttle from Smithsonian
item.description: “The title of this amendment is ‘Houston, We Have a Problem.’”
